title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Mobile Learning Design Pattern Analysis and Application: Systematic Literature Review

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Apply mobile learning literature analysis methodologies to derive at least three science education design patterns
Compare and analyze differences in mobile learning design across K-12, higher education, and professional training contexts
Propose and submit as a project deliverable a team-based mobile learning design framework optimized for science education

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
